metadata.title: CVE-2018-12578 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a heap-based buffer overflow in bmp_compress1_row in appliers.cppin sam2p 0.49.4 that leads to a denial of service or possibly unspecifiedother impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sam2p package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
